articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: OpenAI reportedly developing new generative music tool - TechCrunch
articles.description: Such a tool could be used to add music to existing videos, or to add guitar accompaniment to an existing vocal track, sources said.
articles.content:
OpenAI is working on a new tool that would generate music based on text and audio prompts, according to a report in The Information.
Such a tool could be used to add music to existing videos, or to … [+728 chars]
